sentences.english: The gold-tiled roofs of the imperial palaces glowed in the Peking sun.
sentences.chinese: 皇宮的金色琉璃瓦屋頂在北京的陽光下散發着光輝。

sentences.english: We could see tufts of weeds growing between the glistening yellow tiles.

sentences.english: Magnificent houses, glazed tile hung a curtain.

sentences.english: Roof yellow-green glazed tiles interlocking, far from flying Pavilion Dan, magnificent momentum.

sentences.english: Angle for each is antique cornices pick angle. It is also covered with the follow-green glazed tile roof.

definition: interlocking wooden brackets between the top of a column and crossbeams used in traditional Chinese architecture
(literary) halls (of a palace or a temple)
white marble/a type of white marble used for building and sculpting
